document.full_text: decades after the gay rights movement swept secular schools, more gays and lesbians are coming out at christian colleges but are running up against conservative administrators, trustees and alumni.
document.title: even on religious campuses, students fight for gay identity
lines_and_colors: decades after the gay rights movement swept secular schools, more gays and lesbians are coming out at christian colleges but are running up against conservative administrators, trustees and alumni.
